sentence.Network_en: New stakeholder pensions will aim to give all workers a retirement pension they can live on.

entry.def: Stakeholders are people who have an interest in a company's or organization's affairs.

means.word_mean: 1. someone entrusted to hold the stakes for two or more persons betting against one another; must deliver the stakes to the winner
